初遇.encontent:
Oh my lord, what's going on? We are in the same boat
 now. You don't mean it, do you?
初遇.content:
老爷，这是怎么回事呀？咱现在竟是一伙的了～您不会是
故意的吧？

箱中气候.encontent:
There're people bathing in the sun, and others cosseted by the
 night ...  But someone has to do the dirty work in the foggy
 days when their faces can't be seen. Am I right, my lord?
箱中气候.content:
有人沐浴在阳光里，有人是黑夜的宠儿……但总有人得在
看不清脸的天气里干些脏活……你说对吗，老爷？

致未来.encontent:
My plan is to live restfully till tomorrow ...  My
 dear lord, I don't have time to think that far.
致未来.content:
安稳地活到明天就是我的打算了……亲爱的老爷，我没工
夫想那么远的事～

孑立.encontent: If I shoot right now, will my lord be startled?
孑立.content: 这个时候开枪会不会吓老爷一跳呢？

问候.encontent:
I am here, behaving myself. My dear lord, don't be
 oversensitive.
问候.content: 我乖乖地呆着呢～亲爱的老爷，不必多疑。

朝晨.encontent:
Some kids must be in hunger, right? Are you doing something
 about it, my lord? People like you who are such a
 humanitarian ...
朝晨.content:
总有孩子在饿肚子吧～？老爷不想想办法吗？您这样心怀
博爱……

信任-朝晨.encontent:
So annoying to put on clothes. Who set this rule? You,
 my lord?
信任-朝晨.content: 穿衣服好麻烦喔，这呀到底是哪个老爷规定的～是您吗？

夜暮.encontent:
Are you also interested in my arms, my lord? This is no ordinary
 pistol ...  Ha ha ha, you staring at me so intensely, it makes
 my muzzle shine in the moonlight.
夜暮.content:
老爷也对人家的武器有兴趣吗？这可不是一般的手枪喔……哈
、您看得这么仔细，咱的枪口都在月光下变得有光泽起来
了啊。

信任-夜暮.encontent:
For Italians the night belongs to their lovers and
 families. That's the best moment.
信任-夜暮.content:
意大利人的夜晚是属于伴侣和家人的，这是最美好的时刻
。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent: Ah ... ah ... ah ... Your hand, my lord, it's so warm.
帽檐与发鬓.content: 啊……啊……啊……老爷的手，好暖和喔。

袖与手.encontent: Bang ... Just like this, and then you will see a withering.
袖与手.content: 砰——像这样，然后你就可以看到一场凋谢。

衣着与身形.encontent:
Light, slow, unable to grasp, the good things. Do you
 also like feathers?You are just like them ... Always
 tickling my heart.
衣着与身形.content:
轻飘飘、慢悠悠、又抓不住的好东西，老爷也喜欢羽毛吗
？您跟它们很像……总是挠得人家心痒痒。

嗜好.encontent:
With the gunshot, the feathers are falling down. Ah,
 ah ... So beautiful.
嗜好.content: 枪声响起，羽毛飘散——啊，啊……太美了。

赞赏.encontent:
My lord, no matter what you do, it makes me comfortable.
 What a good lord. You can get any reward you want
 from me.
赞赏.content:
您呀，不论做什么都很让我心情愉悦呢～这样好的老爷，想
向人家要什么样奖励都可以喔……

亲昵.encontent:
Hmm ... So dangerous. I almost fell into it. Come on.
 If it goes on, I may not be able to control myself
 someday.
亲昵.content:
嗯……好危险，人家差点就陷进去了呢。真是的，再这样
下去，说不准哪天咱就克制不住自己了啊。

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
I've heard many stories about "angels," but there is
 only one ending.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
关于“天使”的故事我听过很多种，可我只见过它们的一
种结局。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
When I was young, my sister and I played hide-and-seek in the
 orange farm. I hid up a tree, and my hair was covered with the
 smell of orange blossoms ... It's hard to wash off.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
小时候姐姐和我在橘子农庄里捉迷藏。我躲在一棵树上，头
发沾满了柑橘花的味道……怎么也洗不掉。

独白.encontent:
It is often said "God loves the world," but providence always
 comes when the ending is already set. Fortunately, I have never,
 never regretted anything.
独白.content:
他们常说“神爱世人”……但神的眷顾，总是出现在结局
已定的时候。好在……我从来，从来都没有后悔过。

入队.encontent: Oops, you all look so fierce.
入队.content: 哎呀哎呀，大家看上去都好凶哦～

战前.content: 呵呵，终于还是走到这一步了吗～

择选高阶咒语.content: 老爷可真是贪得无厌啊……

召唤至终的仪式.encontent: Che peccato. Sei dalla parte sbagliata.

洞悉.encontent: Of course I will repay you well.
洞悉.content: 我当然会好好报答您啦。

洞悉之底.encontent:
When I sit on that feather, wherever the wind sends
 me, I will go.
洞悉之底.content: 当我乘着那片羽毛，风将我送往何方，我就去往何方。
